title: TARTAN (Telemetry Assisted Return Through Autonomous Navigation)
detail: System that can be installed in RC aircraft to allow for full autopilot & autonomous Return To Home (RTH) functionality.
extended_details: Through intelligent tracking of aircraft telemetry, TARTAN will be a system that allows for any radio controlled aircraft powerful enough to carry it to support autopilot and RTH and landing functionality. This will result in much safer loss-of-signal scenarios which can be dangerous and costly with conventional RC aircraft.

parts_and_costs.part: Flite Test Water-Resistant Foam Board By Adams (25 Pack)
Adafruit 9-DOF Absolute Orientation IMU Fusion Breakout - BNO055
Adafruit BMP280 I2C or SPI Barometric Pressure & Altitude Sensor
